SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key to generate secret URLs for the application.

RECOVER_SALT.description: Salt for password recovery URL generator

CHECK_IN_SECRET.description: Secret used to verify check-in requests.

BASE_URL.description: The base URL where this application is being hosted.

LOG_LEVEL.description: The severity of log messages to output. Options are debug, info, warning, error, and critical.

REDIS_LOG_LEVEL.description: The severity of log messages to output from redis. Options are debug, info, warning, error, and critical.

DEBUG.description: A flag to indicate that various external actions should be disabled.

HACKATHON_NAME.description: Name of the hackathon this instance is hosting.

SENT_ACCEPTANCES.description: A flag to indicate that the first round of acceptance emails has been sent out

REGISTRATION_OPEN.description: A flag to indicate that registration is open.

REGISTRATION_CLOSED.description: A flag to indicate that registration had opened but has now closed.

CHECK_IN_ENABLED.description: A flag to indicate that check-in is enabled.

RESUMES_LINK.description: Link to a zip file of collected resumes for the corporate portal

MLH_APPLICATION_ID.description: MLH Application ID for MLH OAuth flow.

MLH_SECRET.description: MLH Secret for MLH OAuth flow.

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: API key to send emails with Sendgrid.

GENERAL_INFO_EMAIL.description: The email address to send emails as.

SLACK_TOKEN.description: The secret token for the Slack integration used to send out announcements.

S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: Name of the AWS S3 bucket to store resumes.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS access key used to access S3.

AWS_SECRET_KEY.description: AWS secret key used to access S3.

CDN_URL.description: Domain of the CDN used to serve the app's static assets.

FIREBASE_KEY.description: Key for Firebase which is used to send announcements as push notifications to mobile apps.

KEEN_PROJECT_ID.description: Project ID for Keen IO, which is used to store events

KEEN_WRITE_KEY.description: Write key for Keen IO, which is used to store events
